summary: Enhanced metadata extraction to handle format variations (ordinal sessions, written dates, multi-line sponsors) and improved text cleaning to remove institutional boilerplate

improvements._extract_session: Added support for ordinal format (131st MAINE LEGISLATURE) in addition to bill ID format
improvements._extract_date: Added support for written month format (e.g., 'February 21, 2023') in addition to numeric formats
improvements._extract_sponsors: Improved to handle 'Presented by' syntax, multi-line cosponsorship blocks, and complex formatting
improvements._extract_committee: Enhanced patterns to handle trailing phrases like 'suggested and ordered printed'
improvements._extract_title: Added logic to continue reading next line if title appears incomplete
improvements._is_header_footer: Expanded to catch library reference boilerplate and institutional headers
improvements._clean_body_text: Added skip logic for document preamble to better separate metadata from content
improvements._extract_bill_id: Added fallback method to combine session and LD number from separate document sections

expected_improvements.title: incomplete → 'An Act to Permit Recordings of a Protected Person to Be Admissible in Evidence'

testing_notes: These changes should be tested against the full dataset to ensure they don't break existing extractions while improving coverage for bills with format variations
